column5: HAHA! Somebody already e-mailed me that pic. Sleddin pimp style LOL! Needs some dingo balls on the windsheild.
And the sign on the front says "for sale"!
Actually that foto was around last year at this time but what a neat ride.    vance
Never seen that one before, that's classic, thanks for posting
Cute, but a ragtop?  I'm not sure about that.
They call it the "Metro Sled", it's an old Nash Metropolitan body... nicely redone.
No different than a regular snowmobile douG, but you have a full height windshield with more comfortable seating, along with tunes, lol.
Nice, does in come in hard top ?
Sweet ride, but I prefer vehicles with a back seat.
It looks like it does have a little back seat ? but you may have to settle for the hood.
WOW...I WANT ONE OF THOSE,THATS THE WAY TO RIDE IN STYLE MAN...LOL...LOL
